channel.title: Information Sharing on CS-AWARE-NEXT
channel.description: Recent content in Information Sharing on CS-AWARE-NEXT

item.title: The world is changing…
item.description: The world is changing… … and startups are considered as agents of change. Young people now, as well as less young ones, quit their jobs ‘en masse’ and find substance and what each of us may understand in our own, individual ways as ‘meaning in life’ – this is what became to get known as the Great Resignation or the Big Quit. Many of us have been praised within conservative education and life cultures, feeling that taking risks is worth once you have a big organisation to support you.
